special.name: Shimmer Injector
special.desc:
Mod: Gain 35.0% Attack Speed. The first time you would be reduced to 1 Health, increase the Attack Speed bonus by 100.0% and heal for 35.0% maximum Health.

Overcharge: Instead increase the Attack Speed bonus by 200.0% and heal for 80.0% maximum Health.

special.name: Scroll of Knowledge
special.desc: Use on a unit to open a special armory that offers every available emblem that matches that unit's inherent traits.

special.name: Virulent Bioware
special.desc:
Mod: For 3 seconds after ability cast, dealing damage applies a plague causing the target and enemies within 1 hex to take 18.0% more damage for 5 seconds.

Overcharge: Plague duration increases to 10 seconds and plague deals 3.5000000000000004% of the target's maximum Health per second as magic damage.

special.name: Unstable Chemtank
special.desc:
Mod: Gain 30.0% maximum Health and explode on death, dealing 25.0% of your maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

Overcharge: Explosion radius is increased to 3 hexes.

special.name: Melt-o-matic 3000
special.desc:
Apex Turret's attacks channel on its target instead, rapidly increasing its damage until the target dies. The damage increases by 2000.0% every time the Apex Turret would attack.

1 Copy: 100.0% Attack Damage per tick
2 Copy: 175.0% Attack Damage per tick
3 Copy: 250.0% Attack Damage per tick

special.name: Masterwork Upgrade
special.desc: Use on a unit to open an armory containing Radiant versions of that unit's craftable completed items. Upgrade the item you choose to its Radiant equivalent, and unequip it.

special.name: The Darkin Blade
special.desc: If the holder of this item gets a takedown, they will be consumed and Aatrox will be reborn!

special.name: Repair-o-matic

1 Count: 10 Armor and Magic Resist
2 Count: 50 Armor and Magic Resist
3 Count: 100 Armor and Magic Resist

special.name: Goldinator
special.desc:

3 Count: 4 gold

special.name: Robotic Arm
special.desc:

special.name: Shrink Module
special.desc:

If the holder of this item dies, you instantly lose the fight.

You can remove this item by benching the holder.

special.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Ornn Artifacts.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

special.name: Infinity Force
special.desc: <tftitemrules>Tons of EVERYTHING!</tftitemrules>

special.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
special.desc:
Combat start: The holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a 200 Shield, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist for 20 seconds.

​​[Support item]

special.name: B.F. Sword
special.desc: %i:scaleAD% +10.0% Attack Damage

special.name: Power
special.desc:
Gain Power by winning combats after gaining Charges. More Power gives more stats.

[This does not count as an item.]

special.name: Deathfire Grasp
special.desc:
Combat start: Blast the current target for 20.0% of their max Health as magic damage.

For the next 10 seconds, deal 25.0% more damage. Damage dealt to the blasted target is increased to 35.0%.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

special.name: Giant's Belt
special.desc: %i:scaleHealth% +150 Health

special.name: Needlessly Large Rod
special.desc: %i:scaleAP% +10 Ability Power

special.name: Randuin's Omen
special.desc:
Combat start: Grant %i:scaleArmor% 30 Armor and %i:scaleMR% 30 Magic Resistance to the holder and adjacent allies.

​​[Support item]

special.name: Aegis of the Legion
special.desc:
Combat start: Grant 30% Attack Speed and 15 Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies, and all allies behind them for 8 seconds.

​​[Support item]

special.name: Chalice of Power
special.desc:
Combat start: Grant 18 Ability Power and 10 Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

​​[Support item]

special.name: Gold Collector
special.desc:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% of their maximum Health. Executions have a 40% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

special.name: Unusable Slot
special.desc: This slot can't hold an item.
